"Mwahahahaha!!! Who do you think you are to talk to me like that, bitch? Don't think I'll go easy on you because you're a puny girl" he says, growing nearly 6 meters tall this time. But still she keeps looking at him like he was a common ant trying to bite her shoe she was about to crush.
"Jen, please! Run aw-" But your jaw drops before you can finish as she jumps up to his chest and delivers a punch that sends him flying 20 meters against a wall.

"That was for beating Toby. Consider yourself fortunate to run into someone as nice as me, several of my subjects would have killed you for such rude words" she says, walking towards him. Peter is so terrified he doesn't consider growing larger or counterattacking, that girl wasn't even one third his size but right now it felt like she was the size of a skyscraper. Suddenly he notices he is shrinking down fast and there is nothing he can do about it anymore; in a matter of seconds he is just a couple centimeters in height. "You will spend the following 30 minutes this size, so I recommend you find some safe place. I wouldn't want you to get stomped or something" she says to the fleeing bug-sized bully, and then she walks back where you lay with her sweetest smile. "That takes care of him. Are you okay?" she says as she helds out her hand to you. You are so dumbfounded you don't even realize your broken ribs are healed. Anyway you realize there's quite a crowd around by now.

"Normally I would just make everyone forget about all this... but you know, I don't want you to forget it" she says playfully, blushing. "Maybe it's about time I make myself known to people. Anyway I have to take care of whoever is behind this before I do that... Only one of my subjects could have granted this moron those powers"

Just then you hear a boom and several figures, nearly 30 meters tall, emerge from the staff room - a girl you had never seen and the whole teaching staff of the school. Okay, this has to be a nightmare or something. Most of the students in the courtyard run around in panic, while you cling to Jen's back, which makes her happy. "Why, I guess this explains it. But I'm still surprised. Seriously, causing such a ruckus right before my eyes... I thought any newbie would know better" she says. "Don't get so cocky because you beat that stupid bully, that was just a test" says cheerfully the girl, who was just a kid, probably around 9, and wore a somewhat weird blue robe and a purple cape. "These guys are my puppets - such is the extent of my power! You won't possibly manage to beat this army of mine. I'll seize your throne as a goddess!"

1512.content:
"Cursed?!" Cecilia shakes her head. "You're joking. Curses aren't real."

"Can you think of any other explanation for your growth spurt?" Skyfawn counters almost immediately. Cecilia falls silent. Eventually Skyfawn goes into details.

"I'll start explaining by asking you a question: Do you believe in aliens?"
You and Cecilia glance at each other.
"Yeah, I guess," you reply.

"Good," Skyfawn says. "Aliens aren't stupid enough to invade Earth, they've seen all the films humans have made about them. They're doing something no one has expected; turning Cecilia into a weapon."

"What?! No way!" you shout. "Cecilia would never be evil. She'd never do the invading for them!"

Skyfawn smiles sadly. "Alas, it is more complicated than that. The aliens are currently taking over Cecilia's mind. In a few hours, she'll be their slave."

"Isn't there anything we can do to help her?" you scream. Skyfawn doesn't even blink. She takes a deep breath and says quietly, "My technology is enough to temporarily save her. She must, twice a day, take this drug." She holds up a bottle. "This will revert Cecilia back to normal size, and it will keep her safe. But she must drink it twice a day, otherwise she will begin to grow and turn evil."

"Bottoms up," Cecilia says. Pinching her nose, she gulps it down. Almost immediately, she begins to shrink. Soon she's back to normal.

"Don't worry, I'll be in touch to give you more medicine." She begins to waver.

"Wait," you call after her, but she vanishes.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Some time later, you are at Cecilia's house, revising for a test that is to take place next week. Cecilia looks at her watch.

"Oh, time to take my medicine." She gets up and strolls to the bathroom. She soon comes back, grimicing.
"That medicine is horrible," she says.

Little do we know that something is wrong with the medicine.

Jerrica was always bringing those green toy army men to school, and playing war with them. She liked to pretend she was a giantess, and overpower the tiny toys. Jerrica had green eyes, light brown shoulder-length hair, and a tan that covered her whole body. She was thirteen.

One day, during lunchtime, a meteorite streaked down into the quad, leaving a crater. Most of the kids stayed away from it, but Jerrica ran up to it and actually handled the debris. For some strange reason, the enigmatic object was absorbed into Jerrica's hands...it just melted away, and got absorbed!

Everyone was talking about what just happened, when suddenly, Jerrica shot up into the air...she wasn't flying, she was growing! She just started getting more and more massive. First she was about ten feet high, then, several seconds later, she was twenty feet high, then twenty-five, then thirty! Was she ever going to stop growing?

155.content:
Hailey Jackson, a girl about 15 in my class, she has auburn hair and blue eyes with a slim 4'2" figure. She's this small stick figure kinda thing. I always thought she had problems. She was being bullied by sophomores much taller than her, and I never tried to help her out. That is, until she started developing this growth hormone booster that would make her tall. I came up to her and said, "Hailey, you just got yourself a new partner in this!" She was so excited, and she hugged me so hard. We tested it on plants, animals, and human hair, all making them almost three times their size. Now it was about time to test it on Hailey herself. She gave the mixture a good long chug, and almost instantly, she passed out and started growing and filling up in figure. No longer was she a stick figure, but a full fledged in-crowd girl. After half a minute, she was probably already 5'11" and still growing. When she passed the 6'3" mark, I knew she was almost too big to handle. I had to work quick to try to get her out of the biology lab, but she was getting too heavy to push out. She was now almost 8'10" tall, and still stretching out.

When I finally got her out of the room, her blouse was ruined, her shoes barely strips of leather and her shorts ripped at the seams. Her long hair looked the same length, in ratio anyway, and she was now at least 13 feet tall. Another inch, and her head would probably hit the ceiling. She woke up, and almost gasped, seeing how small I was compared to her. She was an Amazon! She was probably the tallest Human ever to exist. She said to me in a high-pitched voice, "Thanks, Toby, I never would've done this without you! You're a true friend!" I was happy to see the good girl happy, but something was amiss here. I saw a bit of the formula on my shirt. I hoped then I wouldn't turn into an Amazon like Hailey was now.
155.title: Humongous Hailey

info.brief_description: Someone's growing in school! Who is it, and what will happen? You decide!
info.description:
Your name is Toby, and you're sitting in class, when you notice... someone's getting bigger! Is it you who's growing? Your crush? A friend? What will happen?
So far, I've had to add chapters by myself. Can anyone else contribute? This is my first story, so I might be a little picky about how the story flows. As long as you follow the guidelines below, I'll let your additions in.

Please, no vore. No sex either. But toilet stuff IS allowed. I don't have many gift points, so I can't award you gift points for contributing. But additions are very welcome! When you add, please bear in mind:

1. Please use proper grammar.
2. When you add, don't add a sentence or two, minimum is a paragraph.
3.You can reduce the giant(ess) back to normal size.
4.You can shrink people too!
5. No crazy growing (like becoming bigger than the Universe) or shrinking (microscopic).
6. Please make your addition relate to the previous additions.
7. There is NO rule 7.
8. HAVE FUN!!
